faqs.question: What is A One Tuition?
faqs.answer: A One Tuition is a leading educational institute dedicated to helping students achieve academic excellence through personalized and result-oriented coaching.

faqs.question: What subjects do you offer?
faqs.answer: We offer coaching for major subjects including Mathematics, Science, English, and Social Studies for students from Classes 1 to 12 (CBSE, ICSE, and State Boards).

faqs.question: Do you provide online as well as offline classes?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide both online and offline tuition options so students can choose what suits them best.

faqs.question: Where is A One Tuition located?
faqs.answer: We are located in [Your City Name]. You can also reach us directly on WhatsApp at +91 84484 75396 for directions or inquiries.

faqs.question: What makes A One Tuition different from others?
faqs.answer: Our strength lies in experienced tutors, small batch sizes, individual attention, and a focus on conceptual clarity rather than rote learning.

faqs.question: What are your class timings?
faqs.answer: Class timings are flexible and depend on the student’s grade and subject. We also offer custom schedules for working parents or students with extracurricular activities.

faqs.question: How can I enroll my child?
faqs.answer: You can fill out the enquiry form on our website or click to chat on WhatsApp at +91 84484 75396 for instant assistance.

faqs.question: Do you offer demo classes?
faqs.answer: Yes! We provide a free demo class so students can experience our teaching methods before enrolling.

faqs.question: How are the teachers selected?
faqs.answer: All our tutors are qualified professionals with proven teaching experience and a strong track record of student success.

faqs.question: How do you track a student’s progress?
faqs.answer: We conduct regular tests, progress reports, and feedback sessions with both students and parents to ensure consistent improvement.
